body.p: Sir. at the present term of the Christian Circuit Court. Johnathan Greer was found guilty of Manslaughter and the penalty fined at five years in the Penitentiary of our state a petition has been circulated among the citizens of the county praying your Honor to pardon. I have been requested to write a letter in behalf of Mr Greer and Join in the prayer for his release. which I most cheerfully do. I have known Mr Greer for twenty years and a more orderly upright citizen in My Judgment cannot be found in the county I acted as the prosecutor on the examining trial I heard the trial on motion for bail and a part of the trial at the time of his conviction and honestly I did not nor do I now think that the evidence warrants or Justifies the finding of the Jury. I trust your Honor will give Mr Greer a favorable hearing and in view of his age and the Family he must have imporvided for that your will give him a full pardon and restore him to the potitian he so fully merrits a free man

Respt A D Rodgers
Judge of Christian Cty
